articles.author: Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Germany on mysterious broken cables in Baltic Sea: ‘It is sabotage’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Damaged undersea infrastructure has sparked political alarm in Berlin and Helsinki.
articles.content:
The 1,173 kilometer-long cable follows a similar route to the Russia-to-Germany Nord Stream gas pipelines, which exploded in September 2022 in an apparent act of sabotage.
